post.author: 박재홍
post.content:
이 영화 마지막 부분쯤 Corporal Upham이 Edith Piaf 의 노래를 영어로 번역하는 장면에서 발췌했습니다...


Even life itself only represents you.
Sometimes l dream that l’m in your arms.
And you speak softly in my ear.
And you say things that make my eyes close.
And l find that marvelous.
post.title: Saving Private Ryan 에서..
